Module jGame
Package jGame.core.entity

Class Animation

java.lang.Object
jGame.core.entity.render.Animation
public class Animation
extends java.lang.Object
Class responsible for performing animations on entity sprites: rolling through a series of images, thus creating the illusion of animation.
Since:
1.0.0
Author:
Nuno Pereira
